bill_title: revise the state trunk highway system.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the state trunk highway system. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 31-4-143 be amended to read as follows: 31-4-143. The state trunk highway system includes the following in Clay, Turner, Minnehaha, and Lake counties: (1) From a point on Cherry Street in Vermillion near the half section line of section fourteen, township ninety-two north, range fifty-two west, thence north via Stanford Street the Nebraska state line south of Vermillion, thence northerly via Vermillion to State Highway 46 south of Centerville near the northeast corner of section three, township ninety-five north, range fifty-two west ; (2) From a point on State Highway 46 east of Irene near the southwest corner of section thirty-five, township ninety-six north, range fifty-three west , thence north via Viborg to U.S. Highway 18 north of Viborg near the northeast corner of section ten, township ninety-seven north, range fifty-three west; (3) From a point on U.S. Highway 18 north of Viborg near the southwest corner of section thirty-five, township ninety-eight north, range fifty-three west, thence north to State Highway 44 near the northwest corner of section twenty-six, township ninety-nine north, range fifty-three west; (4) From a point on State Highway 44 east of Parker near the southwest corner of section nine, township ninety-nine north, range fifty-three west, thence northerly to State Highway 42 west of Sioux Falls near the northwest corner of section twenty, township one hundred one north, range fifty-two west; (5) From a point on State Highway 42 west of Sioux Falls near the southwest corner of section sixteen, township one hundred one north, range fifty-two west, thence northerly via , Parker, and Humboldt to State Highway 34 southeast of Madison in section sixteen, township one hundred six north, range fifty-two west . Section 2. That § 31-4-229 be amended to read as follows: 31-4-229. The state trunk highway system includes the following in Gregory, Charles Mix, Douglas, Aurora, Jerauld, Beadle, Spink, and Brown counties: (1) From a point on the Nebraska state line near the west line of section thirty-six, township ninety-five north, range sixty-seven west, thence north to U.S. Highway 18 near the southeast corner of section twenty-six, township ninety-five north, range sixty-seven west ; (2) From a point on U.S. Highway 18 south of Armour near the northeast corner of section twelve, township ninety-seven north, range sixty-four west , thence north via Armour and Corsica to U.S. Highway 14 near the northeast corner of section one, township one hundred ten north, range sixty-four west west of Huron ; (3) From a point on U.S. Highway 14 near the southeast corner of section thirty-four, township one hundred twelve north, range sixty-four west, thence north to U.S. Highway 212 in Redfield south of the northeast corner of section nine, township one hundred sixteen north, range sixty-four west; (4) From a point on U.S. Highway 212 in Redfield in section ten, township one hundred sixteen north, range sixty-four west , north of Wolsey, thence northerly via Redfield and Aberdeen to U.S. Highway 12 in Aberdeen near the northwest corner of section twenty-three, township one hundred twenty-three north, range sixty-four west; (5) From a point on U.S. Highway 12 in Aberdeen east of the southwest corner of section thirteen, township one hundred twenty-three north, range sixty-four west, thence northerly via Aberdeen to the North Dakota state line near the north quarter corner of section three, township one hundred twenty-eight north, range sixty-four west to the North Dakota state line .

Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
